verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: a summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un will probably take place in the next three or four weeks] .
President Donald Trump says a summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un [V: will] probably take place in the next three or four weeks .
President Donald Trump says [ARG1: a summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARGM-ADV: probably] [V: take] [ARG2: place] [ARGM-TMP: in the next three or four weeks] .
